lore: Equipped with narthecium-like instruments around which form filthy miasmas, Plague Surgeons carry vials and alembics full of boosters and macro-stimulants for countless plagues. By such means do they give the Death Guard renewed strength and resilience while inflaming the enemy's infections to agonising degrees.

otherAbilities.name: Tainted Narthecium:
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, in your Command phase , you can return 1 destroyed Bodyguard model to that unit.

otherAbilities.name: Diseased Healing:
otherAbilities.description: At the end of your Movement phase , you can select one friendly DEATH GUARD INFANTRY CHARACTER model within 3" of this model. That model regains up to 3 lost wounds. Each model can only be selected for this ability once per turn.
